archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Collection consists of a copy of the "History of Ingles Ferry, Virginia" written by Francis Burke Fitzpatrick.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Francis Burke Fitzpatrick Papers must be obtained from the Special Collections, Virginia Tech

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Francis Burke Fitzpatrick Papers, Ms37-001, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Francis Burke Fitzpatrick Papers commenced in November 2006 and was completed in November 2006.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Born in 1872, Francis Burke Fitzpatrick went on to establish a distinguished career as an educator in Southwest Virginia. Fitzpatrick worked as a teacher, principal, superintendent, and from 1919 until his death in 1943 served as Professor of Education at Radford State Teacher's College.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains an unbound typescript copy of the "History of Ingles Ferry, Virginia" written in 1936 by Francis Burke Fitzpatrick.

did.unittitle: "History of Ingles Ferry, Virginia" by Francis Burke Fitzpatrick 1936
